snippet: In an English-language interview with the British Broadcasting Corporation on Friday, the Egyptian puppet recently accused of acting as a terrorist mouthpiece protested her innocence.
abstract: In an English-language interview with the British Broadcasting Corporation on Friday, the Egyptian puppet recently accused of acting as a terrorist mouthpiece protested her innocence.

headline.main: 'Paranoia Is the Mother-in-Law of Invention,' Puppet Accused of Terror in Egypt Tells BBC

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
